message:
Summary: **USER_CONTEXT:** Address new code review comments from Gemini Code Assist for PR #109 - ensure consistent error handling across all fetchData call sites and add title attribute to delete button

**TASK_TRACKING:**
- Task 1: Review all fetchData call sites and update error handling to use structured data - **IN_PROGRESS**
- Task 2: Add title attribute to delete button for accessibility consistency - **TODO**
- Task 3: Test changes and verify all tests pass - **TODO**
- Task 4: Commit fixes and push changes - **TODO**
- Task 5: Update PR #109 with fixes - **TODO**

**COMPLETED:**
- Replaced magic number 10 with DEFAULT_FEED_ITEMS_LIMIT constant in backend/app.py
- Updated fetchData function to use structured error data (error.backendMessage)
- Improved error handling in handleAddFeed, handleEditFeedSubmit, and handleDeleteFeed
- All backend tests passing (74 passed, 1 skipped)
- Closed PR #108 and created PR #109 for latest changes

**PENDING:**
- Update remaining fetchData call sites to handle thrown exceptions properly
- Add title attribute to delete button for accessibility
- Test and commit changes
- Update PR #109 with fixes

**CURRENT_STATE:** PR #109 under review with 2 comments, working on addressing remaining error handling consistency issues

**CODE_STATE:**
- File: backend/app.py - Added DEFAULT_FEED_ITEMS_LIMIT constant, replaced magic numbers
- File: frontend/script.js - fetchData now throws errors, structured error handling partially implemented

**TESTS:**
- All backend tests: 74 passed, 1 skipped

**CHANGES:**
- Modified backend/app.py: Added constant and replaced magic numbers
- Modified frontend/script.js: Enhanced fetchData error handling, updated error display in multiple functions

**DEPS:**
- pytest, flask-cors and other dependencies for testing

**VERSION_CONTROL_STATUS:**
- Branch: feat/editable-feed-urls-fixed
- Latest commit: 958e1f5 "fix: Address code review comments - use constants for magic numbers, improve error handling with structured data, add user notifications"
- PR #109 open and under review
- PR #108 closed

**REVIEW COMMENTS TO ADDRESS:**
1. HIGH: Ensure all fetchData call sites handle thrown exceptions correctly (handleRefreshAllFeeds, loadFeedsForTab, handleAddTab, etc.)
2. MEDIUM: Add title attribute to delete button for accessibility consistency
